mapper.select:
select count(p.id) from t_mall_pifa p left join t_mall_product mp on mp.id= p.product_id where p.is_delete = 0 and mp.is_delete = 0
and p.is_use = -1
and p.pf_start_time > now() and p.pf_end_time > now()
and p.pf_start_time <= now() and now() < p.pf_end_time
and p.pf_start_time < now() and p.pf_end_time <= now()
and p.shop_id = #{shopId}
and
p.shop_id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select b.id, b.product_id as productId, pf_price, pf_start_time, pf_end_time, b.user_id, b.shop_id, b.create_time, b.is_delete, b.is_use,b.pf_type, c.image_url as imageUrl,e.specifica_img_url as specImageUrl,p.is_specifica as isSpecifica,p.pro_name as proName ,if(p.is_specifica = 0 ,p.pro_price,d.inv_price) as proPrice,p.pro_stock_total as proStockTotal from t_mall_pifa b left join t_mall_product p on b.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT ass_id,image_url from t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON b.product_id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price,id FROM t_mall_product_inventory where is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON b.product_id=d.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON d.specifica_img_id=e.id where b.id = #{id}

SELECT
from t_mall_pifa p left join t_mall_order o on p.id=o.group_buy_id and o.order_type=7 left join t_mall_store s on p.shop_id = s.id WHERE p.is_delete = 0 and p.is_use =1 and p.id = #{id} group by p.id
select count(id) from t_mall_order o where o.group_buy_id=#{pifaId} and o.buyer_user_id=#{joinUserId} and o.order_type=7 and o.order_status > 1 and o.order_status < 5
